content.title: RHSA-2024:7428: kpatch-patch-5_14_0-70_112_1 and kpatch-patch-5_14_0-70_85_1 security update (Important)
content.description:
This is a kernel live patch module which can be loaded by the kpatch command line utility to modify the code of a running kernel.  This patch module is targeted for kernel-5.14.0-70.85.1.el9_0.

Security Fix(es):

* kernel: wifi: mac80211: Avoid address calculations via out of bounds array indexing (CVE-2024-41071)

For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, acknowledgments, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.
